OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

addVoters(address[],bool[]).details: Only the contract owner can call this function. Emits `VoterAdded` for each updated entry.

params.statuses: True to allow, false to revoke
params.voters: Addresses to update in the allowlist

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

register(uint256).details: A given allowlisted address can register exactly once. Reverts if      the caller is not allowlisted or has already registered, or if the      same commitment has been previously inserted. Emits `NewLeaf`.

params._commitment: The Poseidon-based commitment to insert into the IMT

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

vote(bytes,bytes32,bytes32,bytes32,bytes.details: Enforces single-use via `s_nullifierHashes`. Public inputs order must      match the circuit: root, nullifierHash, vote, depth. The `_vote`      value is interpreted as: 1 => yes, any other value => no. Emits `VoteCast`.

params._depth: Tree depth used by the circuit
params._nullifierHash: Unique nullifier to prevent double voting
params._root: Merkle root corresponding to the registered commitments tree
params._vote: Encoded vote: 1 for yes, otherwise counted as no

addVoters(address[],bool[]).notice: Batch updates the allowlist of voter EOAs

register(uint256).notice: Registers a commitment leaf for an allowlisted address

vote(bytes,bytes32,bytes32,bytes32,bytes.notice: Casts a vote using a zero-knowledge proof
